alert.note: Alert for Barnstable (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 3:22AM EST until January 23 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (2.7 to 13.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Barnstable MA County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
